summary.span: Contém propriedades e métodos de nível superior que não precisam ser precedidos pela propriedade Application .

span.span: Contains top-level properties and methods that don't need to be preceded by the Application property.

para.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.
